reviews.title: Favorite Hoodie Ever
reviews.review_text: So I am a big girl, so the hoodie obviously doesn't look like it does on the model. However, it fits me perfectly. It is so warm and snuggly. My favorite hoodie ever. I live in Maine and I was perfectly warm standing outside in 30 degree weather. I have already told my mom, sister, and daughter they should get one too.

My daughter wears hers 24/7 she is 9 and when she gets home from school the first thing she does is puts hers on. she used to walk around with a blanket around her all the time which drove me crazy so this was the best replacement for that and she agree's.

reviews.title: Outstanding
reviews.review_text: I sent this to my mom, as she's in a post hospital rehab. She gets chilled and this was the perfect remedy. Very easy for her to slip on. The length is excellent and adds to comfort while lounging semi upright in bed. She loves the color and the print and has not stopped raving about her blanket hoodie!

reviews.title: Love my Oversized Sherpa Blanket Hoodie
reviews.review_text: Love, love, love it. I am 5'3 and weigh 300 lbs. I have been wanting one of these but have been unable to find one that would fit. I get the chills at night and this keeps me nice and warm. My only complaint is I wish it was longer as it hits me just above the knee. The Sherpa on the inside sheds a bit, so you might get some white fuzzies on your Pjs the first few times you wear it. That's just a minor issue. It's keeps me warm and cozy and is very soft and comfortable.

reviews.title: ohhh yeahh 10/10
reviews.review_text: So Cozy—Highly Recommend! This blanket hoodie is the best thing ever! It's super soft, warm, and perfect for lounging or staying cozy on chilly days. It feels like a warm hug, and I seriously recommend it to everyone. You won't want to take it off!💖
Very oversized and comfortable. Would suggest ordering one size up for extra room if you are Plus Size.
I have several of these, love them. Great for cold weather without being bulky. Very warm and cozy.p

reviews.title: Cozy warm hoodie
reviews.review_text: I wear xl/1xl in tops and 2xl in pants and this is still very roomy on me. It is so soft and warm, I'm sure it'll get a lot of use this winter.
Ordered for my grandson, he loves to cuddle under a blanket to watch TV %26 usually drags a blanket with him. This is more compact with a hood %26 actually wearing it. He loved it!

I really like it, however it could be a little thicker and bigger. I base that opinion because I have a friend who has one and hers WAS thicker and bigger. But seriously, I really do like it for the money. It kept me warm during the snow, i was homeless, so that says a Lot!!

reviews.title: Sherpa wearable hoodie
reviews.review_text: Love these wearables hoodies. Our winter can be brutal. The Sherpa fabric is so soft. The shipping was very fast. I just ordered 2 more. I love how big the pockets are so big. I also love how the inside lining is so soft. Thank you. I'm in love.

reviews.title: Size matters.
reviews.review_text: i loved the materials used to make this product but the product size is way smaller than the what it should be if you're a bigger or plus size a 4%265xl it fits more like a 1xl.. otherwise it is very soft and cozy

reviews.title: 18 year old loves this
reviews.review_text: He liked that it fit as he is growing alot at 18. He said it feels like a warm fuzzy blanket around his body and he actually wore outside and felt warm

reviews.title: Cozy and soft
reviews.review_text: Very comfy, the head opening is kind of small!/tight. So if you have a big neck/head, it will not fit. Mine fits a little tighter than I preferred, but still would recommend it. The body is very roomy.
soooo comfy. i saw these went on sale and i just HAD to grab the cow print wearing it now and have zero complaints
I bought this for my granddaughter and she loves it. The material is aoft a d it's very comfortable for her!

reviews.title: Cozy, comfortable and perfect for drafty snow days
reviews.review_text: It's much more cozy and warm than I expected. I love it! It came a few days before a snowstorm so I was very pleased. I get cold easily and this will do the job.

reviews.title: Cute and well made
reviews.review_text: My granddaughter wanted this strawberry hoodie to wear with her bestie so they look like twins. She loves it! It is very well made. Actually would fit an adult but she wanted it extra big. It's very brightly colored and warm.

I got this for my daughter's Valentine's Day basket and she loves it. It is very warm and soft. It did come in extremely wrinkled, from its packaging, but it washed out fine. The print with the strawberries is very cute and girly.

reviews.title: Soft and Adorable
reviews.review_text: Looks just like photo and is soft. Only downsides for me is the hood. Its very small in proportion to the rest of it. I don't want an overly sized hood but this one is small- it fits my head the way a beanie would- i had hoped it would be slightly larger and loose to match the relaxed fit of the hoodie itself- but it doesn't bother me enough to ruin it for me or make me want to return it. I would however, not purchase one of these again without first making sure the hood part is a bit more comfy/loose.

reviews.title: Will buy again. It's kids sized
reviews.review_text: Is for shorter kids if you want something longer to the ankles. My son 11 yrs old 5” and this reaches as far down as his knees. Besides the length, it other fits well!!! Would definitely recommend if you're looking for something warm for the kids indoor or for road rips

reviews.title: Really warm!
reviews.review_text: I wasn't too sure about this, but after wearing the first time, I got one for my granddaughter. It kept me really warm when we were in a winter storm in South Texas. The only thing I could ask for are some more subdued prints, but it was cold enough I wore it to work anyway. I got the “beige” leopard print, but it's really more of a light pink.

reviews.title: Cute
reviews.review_text: Cute soft and warm perfect for reading my favorite book
Shipped quick, Fit who I bought it for amazing. Very warm and pockets great addition
Extremely comfortable. Excellent quality.Cozy . Get you one.

reviews.title: Worked out great
reviews.review_text: I bought this for my Granddaughter and she says it is just what she wanted. Roomy and comfy.
Absolutely amazing almost too warm lol I find myself periodically taking it off lol . So snuggly tho I love it
It doesn't have a zipper or at least buttons. The neckline is so tight, I have to keep pulling it down so it's not chocking me

reviews.title: Soft and warm
reviews.review_text: Super soft, warm oversized. Was a big hit with teens and young adults.

reviews.title: Daughter loves it
reviews.review_text: Bought for my daughter's birthday she loves it. It wasnt as think as I imagined
i absolutely love everything about it! i ended up buying the avocado one for my daughter🥰 i even had to get a purple and blue for my grand daughters

reviews.title: Super cute
reviews.review_text: Bought this for a friends daughter and she loved it so much she didn't want to take it off! Her Mom loved it too!

reviews.title: Great Buy!
reviews.review_text: Livhil wearable blanket hoodie sweater is a great purchase. It is large and roomy. It is thick and warm. It is as pictured.

reviews.title: She gives it a 10,000/5 star
reviews.review_text: My 16 y.o daughter loves it, says it cozy she makes me want to get one for myself if there's more in stock

reviews.title: Soft and comfy
reviews.review_text: Adorable and soft hoodie. Big and comfy plus well made. It was a gift for a grandchild teen who loves it.

reviews.title: Gift well loved
reviews.review_text: Purchased for my mom who is always freezing and loves cows and she absolutely loves it. Very nice material. She says it's the best.

reviews.title: Love this!
reviews.review_text: This was bought for my son and he loves it. It's so soft and comfy! It did not change when we washed it!

reviews.title: i recommend this product!
reviews.review_text: i like that it has a hoodie and pockets. i also like the material inside. i dont like that its short on the bottom, but other than that it is a nice product.

reviews.title: Yummy warm
reviews.review_text: We have been very cold where I live. Got it today and put it on and has been a big help in helping keep warm. Have not had to have the heater up so high. So it also helps save money.

Seems comfortable and looks nice. Not a crazy smell. Way too large for the 10 year old boys I purchased for. Will be returning for that alone. The boys are average height for their age but they are slim. Might be ok for bigger boys or 13 year olds

reviews.title: In love
reviews.review_text: I now have 2 of these, I'm in love with them!! Plan to get more…
My son loves it, very comfortable. My other son wants one now.
im a heavy set "size 24" woman and this fits me comfortably and i love it!!
It was for my granddaughter, and she loved the color, comfort, and warmth.

reviews.title: Very comfortable
reviews.review_text: Very soft, comfortable and exactly like described.
Super comfortable just wish it was a little more space in it, warmer but its ok cause I love it!
This was a gift for my granddaughter and she loves it!

reviews.title: Warm comfy and not too heavy to wear.
reviews.review_text: I feel so very warm and I look like a teddy bear
it's a great length for watching a movie in a recliner on a cold night
I LOVE that this is so warm and cozy. Definitely no complaints here on this one!

reviews.title: Perfect day n night wear. Love ❤️ it
reviews.review_text: Love the light weight. Perfect for this area. The color is terrific 👌

reviews.title: Comfy
reviews.review_text: I bought 4 of these and everyone loved them. Soft, warm. Oversized.
Its so good my husband wants one! He had 0 interest in it until he felt how soft it was!

reviews.title: love it
reviews.review_text: my daughter loves it and shes so comfortable

reviews.review_text: My daughter loved it. I had to purchase the longer one for her as well

reviews.title: SOOOO COMFY
reviews.review_text: I love it so much I bought my boyfriend and me one. I am about to buy one for the whole family.

reviews.title: Good to have during the coldest winter months
reviews.review_text: Feel soft and warm. Colors are vibrant. Big enough to cover my whole legs.
my daugher recived this for Christmas and loves it she wears it non stop when she is home.

reviews.title: Nice Blanket Hoodie
reviews.review_text: I like that it is easy to slip into, cozy, and cute.

reviews.title: Warm and Fuzzy
reviews.review_text: Cozy and fuzzy! Very soft inside and out. Good for walking the dog in the morning!

reviews.title: Must buy!
reviews.review_text: I loved the pattern, the color and the warmth. Perfect for winter or cozy nights in.
I got it as a Christmas gift for my mom, she loves it and wants another one.
I love the warmth and softness BUT did not like the length! it could have been longer

I think it's so cute and it's half of what I paid for my other ones which made me very happy
love the color and comfort. also like the 2 pockets
We got these for our kids! They are absolutely the best! I'm getting one for myself! 11, 9 %26 8 years

reviews.title: Very warm and soft
reviews.review_text: Very warm, very soft my whole family likes to sleep with the house cold so you can put this on and it's like a blanket
received them in great condition, very thick and cozy, was brought for a Christmas gift, hopefully they love them as much as I do

reviews.title: Cow Blanket Hoodie
reviews.review_text: This is very cute. Got a cow one for a friend. Says oversized but the one I got is about the size of a 2xl sweatshirt.

reviews.title: Hands down my fav buy of the decade!
reviews.review_text: I can not tell you how many compliments I get on this! I adore it and its super cozy. i wear it as a winter jacket

reviews.title: Perfect buy
reviews.review_text: Bought this for my 10 year old daughter for Christmas. She practically lives in it. Very Oversize for her mo and comfy.

reviews.title: Soft and cozy - perfect!
reviews.review_text: I gifted the Sushi design one to my granddaughter for Christmas and she loved everything about it!

reviews.title: Grandkids loved these
reviews.review_text: Grandkids loved these - nice and fuzzy and cozy

reviews.title: soft and comfy
reviews.review_text: I bought 2 of these one for my daughter and my daughter-in-law for Christmas and they love them. ❤️

reviews.review_text: Soft and warm and comfy. I love it!
My elementary aged kids love it. Soft and comfy. Great buy and prompt shipping!

reviews.title: Great and very warm.
reviews.review_text: This is a gift I know she will love this.

Exellent, I both 2of my grandkids as a Christmas gift, they love it.
It is definitely oversized but my son loves it. Teenager approved.

reviews.title: So soft
reviews.review_text: My kids love them!! They are perfect for winter!!

reviews.title: Sketchy seller
reviews.review_text: I never received the item. This seller seems sketchy. A shipping label was immediately created but then the order sat there and never got to the shipping company.

reviews.title: B%— I'm a cow
reviews.review_text: I Live for this sweater blanket. I'm in Houston right now and the nights here are freezing … it's so casual to wear if I'm out at night and I'm chilling. So many compliments!!

reviews.title: After a shower, immediate warmth 🩷
reviews.review_text: Now that its colder wearing this, paired with my neck pillow, is amazing! 😍 I feel like napping on the couch has gotten a lot better/ enjoyable

reviews.title: Soft and comfortable
reviews.review_text: Nothing to dislike! Bought this for my daughter and she loves it. Definitely getting another one for me.
There is nothing to dislike. It's a beautiful color, And very warm. I'm very glad I ordered this. I recommend that anyone could get this.
i bought this one as a gift to my daughter she loves it and the design i pick for her warm soft and cozy.

reviews.title: Wearable Blanket Hoodie
reviews.review_text: This blanket hoodie was a gift yet it's one that I would want for myself. It was soft and I loved it.

reviews.title: Perfect gift.
reviews.review_text: Bought the oversized plush hoodie for my adult daughter's birthday. She loved it. Now everybody wants one!
